description:
• As a Senior Sales Manager in the Retail area, you will build and expand national and international customer relationships, acquire new customers and further develop relationships with existing customers.
• You will position our services in the SAP environment, create individual offers with the team, make presentations to customers and conduct contract negotiations.
• You will analyze customer requirements, develop solution concepts and corresponding sales strategies in collaboration with the SAP Consulting Retail team.
• You will also represent Nagarro at trade fairs, congresses and other events.

• You have a degree in business informatics, industrial engineering, business administration or a comparable field of study or training.
• You have many years of sales experience for consulting and services as well as licenses in the SAP environment (including S/4HANA transformation).
• You have several years of industry experience in the retail/wholesale environment.
• You are a team player with the ability to work independently and proactively and are willing to contribute to a dynamic retail team.
• Excellent communication and presentation skills that enable you to present comprehensive offers convincingly.
• Business fluent in German and fluent in English.
• You are willing to travel for approx. 40% of the work in the DACH region.

• 30 days of paid vacation, internal and external training opportunities, MyN – Nagarro Employee Share Program, attractive company car and company bicycle arrangements, company-funded accident insurance policy, modern office space at central locations with high-tech equipment, sports programs, access to the corporate benefits portal, free fruit and drinks.
• Plenty of room for innovation in a high-growth environment with the latest technologies and products. With us, you can get involved and make a difference
• Flat hierarchies and a long-term, stable job with attractive development opportunities
